attributes.action: MAKE THE GOVERNMENT ASK THE PUBLIC IF THEY AGREE TO THE TERMS BEFORE PASSING A LAW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to ask the public if they agree to the terms of a law, such as road pricing, before it is passed. By using maybe a national vote the public would at least have some say in what happens in this country. We should have our views heard.

rejection.details: Please re-submit without using BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
